name: SUPER FARM WAR
description:
READ THESES RULES BEFORE YOU PLAY !

Have a wonderfull time with your friends, gather up two other friends with you and let's battle !!!
The goal of the game is to eat one of your opponent and flee from the other. 
You eat an opponent by touching them and gain a point by going back to your 
base while he is still in your stomack. You are safe from your predator in 
your own base.

Prey/Predators :

-The Chicken eat the Snake.
-The Fox eat the Chicken.
-The Snake eat the Fox.

Speed-bonus will spawn randomly from the center of the arena  during the game, 
they will activate auromaticly when you touch them.

Please keep in mind that the game is still in alpha and still as a lot of bug fixing 
to be done and content to be added, so I would love to have your feedback.

Also if I get enough people asking for it, I will make the game playable in
online multyplayer !

Have fun playing with your friends !
